clues.text: Barbara Jo Walker from Memphis won this distinction in 1947 & was the last to be crowned in a swimsuit

FDR addressed the crisis in part by creating this body, the SEC, to regulate the stock market

rounds.text: Reluctant to write what became her most famous novel, she said, "Never liked girls or knew many, except my sisters"
